summary: REQ-37 appears implemented via a new callout on the Install page linking users to /mobile-app-packaging for APK creation. The diff excerpt does not provide clear evidence that REQ-35 (explicit “Build an APK (Android)” step-by-step section with APK vs AAB explanation and use of the displayed deployment origin) or REQ-36 (TWA prerequisite subsection referencing assetlinks.json placeholders and assetlinks.README.txt) were added to /mobile-app-packaging.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update /mobile-app-packaging to include a clearly labeled, step-by-step “Build an APK (Android)” section that explains APK vs AAB, provides a sequential checklist using Android Studio WebView wrapper and/or TWA, and references the deployed site origin shown on the page as the start URL.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff excerpt for MobileAppPackagingGuidePage.tsx only shows the page header and a general “Important Note” about external tooling; it does not show an explicit “Build an APK (Android)” section, the APK vs AAB explanation, a sequential checklist, or a reference to the displayed deployment origin as the packaging start URL. Because the file content is truncated, this cannot be verified from the evidence provided.
